transcripts.text: You take such pride in having countless minds in your grip.

You even push child baptism for your power trip.  You lied to us right from the start.  Whole families you've torn apart.  We're so done with you.  There is joy in thinking clearly And in breaking free completely From a mind controlling power To be rid of your deception To be loved without condition.
There's no better way to be Our joy Being free.

It takes enormous courage to first question beliefs.  Pursuit of honest answers can bring long nights of grief.  But sunshine follows every storm.  The freedom to defy your norms is our paradise.  There is joy in thinking clearly And in breaking free completely From a crime concealing cause To be free from your coercion To no more need your permission.
There's no better way to be.  Our joy is being free.

This joy could not be ours if we stayed under your spell.  Our breaking free allows us to speak out and free others as well.  There is joy in thinking clearly And in breaking free completely From a soul-destroying call To escape your doomsday teaching And the fear and guilt you're preaching.

There's no better way to be.  Our joy is being free.  I'm slowly thinking clearly And I'm breaking free completely From my mind controlling commas To be rid of your deception To be loved without condition.  There's no better way to be.  Our joy is being free.
